mapper.insert: insert into bobo.choicequestion (questionId, question, choice1, choice2, choice3, choice4, answer) VALUE (#{questionId}, #{question}, #{choice1}, #{choice2}, #{choice3}, #{choice4}, #{answer})
mapper.update: update bobo.choicequestion set question = #{question}, choice1 = #{choice1}, choice2 = #{choice2}, choice3 = #{choice3}, choice4 = #{choice4}, answer = #{answer} where id = #{id};
mapper.select: select question, choice1, choice2, choice3, choice4, answer from bobo.choicequestion where questionId = #{questionId};
select id from bobo.choicequestion where questionId = #{questionId};
